name: Slurpodrome VR
description:
Inspired by the minigame in Fortune Street and wanting to try out some elements using SteamVR, I created a project in Unity that lets you be fully immersed in a slime race. Gameplay loop is just a simple race where you can choose which slime you hope will win.

Was created and tested with an Oculus Quest, unsure how other VR setups will work with this project
